name: GDG DevFest 2022
desc: This a web application that interacts with Sessionize API, making it easier for volunteers to manage and display their event schedule through the sessionized web app. I created this web app to market their Google Devfest event which happened on Nov 19, 2022.

name: Rate Your Landlord
desc: When tenants search for landlords to rent from, this web application provides information on previous tenantsâ€™ experiences.   Users can view, add, update, and delete listings, and can create a review and add a rating.

name: Virtual Piano App
desc: This is a web piano for those who want to practice piano everyday without a piano and to apply my knowledge on ReactJS, HTML, SaSS and ToneJS for experimental purposes.

name: MusicAdventures
desc: This website is a musician website for those would like to start a orchestra or band used to demonstrate HTML, CSS, JavaScript proficiency at BrainStation.
